rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with a large, airy space incorporating floor-to-ceiling windows to allow natural light. Decorated with traditional Indian motifs aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area for family interactions. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for ample sunlight, with elegant decor and modern furnishing, designed keeping the eastern facade open per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space that overlooks the central courtyard. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide natural lighting and a sense of connection with the outdoors.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen designed for efficiency, equipped with ample storage and integrated appliances. Placed in the southeast to promote positive energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with private access to the central courtyard. Floor-to-ceiling windows enhance natural lighting and a serene atmosphere.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small room dedicated to laundry and storage, conveniently located near the kitchen area.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A large door with reinforced glass to ensure security while promoting an inviting atmosphere, aligned with Vastu entrances.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Living Room Window
openings.description: Provides abundant natural light and a panoramic view of the central courtyard.

openings.name: Dining Room Window
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window enhancing dining experience with outdoor views and natural light.

openings.name: Central Courtyard Door
openings.description: Provides access to the central courtyard from multiple rooms, facilitating natural ventilation.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance
openings.description: Accessible from the ground floor leading to the swimming pool area in the backyard.

additional_features.name: Central Courtyard
additional_features.description: A landscaped open space designed to serve as a communal area and provide natural light. Includes water features and seating areas.

additional_features.name: Swimming Pool
additional_features.description: A luxury swimming pool integrated into the backyard design, offering leisure and relaxation space for the family.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows that provide a serene view of the landscape. Placed in the north-west per Vastu to ensure restful sleep.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom designed for privacy and play. Features floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure ample natural light.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another child bedroom with similar specifications to ensure a balanced living space.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: A quiet study area with large windows for natural light, designed to promote focus and creativity.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: A luxurious bathroom attached to the master bedroom with modern fixtures and ample storage.

rooms.name: Child Bathroom 1
rooms.description: A functional bathroom for Child Bedroom 1 with efficient design.

rooms.name: Child Bathroom 2
rooms.description: A functional bathroom for Child Bedroom 2 with efficient design.

openings.name: Master Bedroom Window
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window providing a serene view and ample natural light.

openings.name: Study Room Window
openings.description: Large window ensuring bright, natural light for studying and work.

vastu_details.energy_flow: The design follows Vastu principles to enhance natural light and ensure positive energy flow throughout the house.

description: A luxury farmhouse with a central courtyard and swimming pool designed for modern living while respecting traditional Indian architectural norms and Vastu principles.
